document.p: The Global Information section on the Local Network page groups the following settings:
document.li1:
Local Device IP address:
This is the IP address on which local devices can access the . This is also the IP address used to access these configuration pages.

Local Network subnet:
The subnet mask used in combination with the Local IP address. This combination will determines the address range used by the DHCP server (see the values for Network address, DHCP Start address and DHCP End address under DHCP Settings).

Local Network IPv6 state:
Allows you to enable or disable IPv6 on the local network.
